amount.header: Please select an amount or enter a custom amount

buyMeal.subheader: Send Chinatown Love will connect merchants with local organizations that will distribute your gifted meals to our community in need.
buyMeal.prompt: Please enter how many meals to gift
buyMeal.explanationFirst: By gifting a meal, your donation will still go directly to the merchant.
buyMeal.explanationSecond: Our partners will then distribute vouchers with those who can benefit the most from a free meal.

body.header: Sorry Your Dumpling Was Not Found
body.subHeader1: The page you are trying does not exist or has been moved.
body.subHeader2: Please try going back to the homepage.

merchantsPage.platformInfoDescription: 我们会提供网上平台去帮助一些受到疫情影响的传统的，不会使用科技的，只收现金的亚洲华人商家。
merchantsPage.platformInfoAction: 我们将会通过募集接受捐款或礼品券去帮助他们
merchantsPage.flyerAsk: Know of any business owners that fit our target merchant?
merchantsPage.flyerDownload: Download our flyer to share with them.

donationPool.header: 如果你不太确定捐款给哪个商家？
donationPool.description1: 我们会把你的捐款平均分配给商家

contributionBar.footer: 所有的收益将会到所需的商家手里，免信用卡手续费

descriptionBox.bullet1: 亚洲移民创办的小生意
descriptionBox.bullet2: 英语上不流畅，以现金收入为主，或者不太懂网上新科技的商人
descriptionBox.bullet3: 现在财务受困，影响到付房租，付水电费，及发工资给员工的能力
descriptionBox.bullet4: 沒有网址，网上外卖，或接受礼品券的服务
descriptionBox.bullet5: 在纽约华埠，法拉盛，及八大道等

donationBox.header: Not sure who to donate to?
donationBox.description: To support every merchant on this page, contribute to our donation pool. We distribute funds evenly across all businesses.

gamBox.description: Double the impact of your donation by gifting meals from our merchants to local organizations that will distribute your gifted meals to our community in need.

gamHome.description: 让你的爱心有更大的影响力，捐献给我们的商家以提供爱心餐给社区公益团体，发送给有需要的人。

subheading.step2Text: 捐款收益全数归给我们的商家
subheading.step3Text: 我们将餐券捐给社区公益团体
subheading.step4Text: 社区公益团体发送餐点给有需要的人

noCampaignsBox.CTA: 没有进行中的活动？你仍然可以捐献！
noCampaignsBox.description: 捐出的爱心餐将会自动加入下一次的活动。

videoBox.caption: 现在观看爱心餐活动如何为我们的社区带来正面的影响。

description.andRestaurants: 以及受到 COVID-19 疫情影响的餐厅合作，捐爱心餐给需要的团体。

buyMealPool.prompt: Please enter how many meals to gift
